page.title: 01General description of area.
page.content: { Farmland}covers about 69% of the area in the North and West,most of which is cropland (45%) and grassland (21%). {The built up area}covers about 21% of our section, being concentrated in the South East around Westerhope and Chapel Park with a smaller area in the North East at Woolsington. There are two{shopping centres}in our area. One is in Chapel Park and the other is on the sides of Stamfordham Road in Westerhope. There are first{schools}in every residential area for example in our area there is St.Marks R.C. Primary, Milecastle First School and Simonside First School. Chapel Park Middle School serves most of our area. There is a small{industrial area}off Newbiggin Lane and an open-cast coal mine behind Whorlton Hall.
